title: Quilt
description: dark blue with browns and tan; 7-7 3/4\" dark blue border surrounds 6 3/4\" appliqued squares that form dots and petals; hand stitched and outlined; 4 randomly placed white dots
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
